meanings.sent1: I will discontinue the game when it's time for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to discontinue the old product line.
meanings.sent3: Why did the music suddenly discontinue right before the best part?
meanings.sent4: The river seemed to discontinue its flow as it froze over in winter.
meanings.sent5: She had to discontinue her singing lessons due to a busy schedule.

meanings.sent1: The movie will discontinue in just a few minutes.
meanings.sent2: The rain will discontinue by the time we reach home.
meanings.sent3: The teacher's patience finally decided to discontinue after the third interruption.
meanings.sent4: The road seemed to discontinue into the misty horizon.
meanings.sent5: The laughter in the room discontinue abruptly as the lights went out.
